Lrabbit_spider
=====

Lrabbit_spider is small scrapy



Installing
----------



    $ pip install -U lrabbit_scrapy


A Simple Example
----------------


    $ pip install lrabbit_spider
    $ lrabbit_spider newscrapy myspider_name
    $ python myspider_name.py



Links
-----

-   author: https://www.lrabbit.life/
